subject-English: The organisation has a clear strategy for employee engagement with digital.
題目-Chinese: 公司內部有清楚訓練計劃，來提升員工的數位技能。

subject-English: Employees are provided with regular updates regarding the benefits for using digital, via wide range of interactive channels.
題目-Chinese: 公司已設立內部溝通平台，廣納員工對規劃中數位產品的意見，以達產品效益最適化。

subject-English: Functional leaders are assessed on the frequency of adoption of digital technologies within their area.
題目-Chinese: 公司已設立管理機制，來收集中階主管(經理以上)對新數位產品的使用頻率。

subject-English: Senior management are accountable for increased digital adoption, monitored using clear performance targets.
題目-Chinese: 高階主管(處長以上)對上述使用頻率較低的中階主管，進行及時督導並訂定改善行動方案。

subject-English: All employees are encouraged to continuously consider opportunities for product and service innovation via digital.
題目-Chinese: 公司設立獎勵機制(如內部黑客松)，來鼓勵員工提供數位創新想法。
